You'd be surprised, the layering of the grass would have to be completely reworked:

As you can see here, the layer was actually built over her leg then cut so it wouldn't overlap. The way I make an image is a LOT of smoke and mirrors until it comes time to render the final image. Lucky for me all I need to do is paint over with a new grass layer
